feed.title: BIPS proposal for implementing AML-KYC in bitcoin

entry.title: BIPS proposal for implementing AML-KYC in bitcoin
entry.summary: A proposal was made by Prabhat Kumar Singh via the bitcoin-dev mailing list to create an AML-KYC module to control the network and qualify use cases in an OFAC compliant way. However, in response, odinn simply replied with the word "No." s7r then added to the discussion with a PGP signed message that read "2^256 x _NO_".
